snippet.title: Indie Heroes Collection 1 - Evercade Cartridge Tour
snippet.description:
Captured off the original Evercade handheld.

Games on the cart:
00:00:42 - Alien Cat 2 (MegaDrive / Genesis)
00:09:32 - Anguna: Warriors of Virtue (GameBoy Advance)
00:12:35 - Chain Break (GameBoy)
00:19:34 - Deadeus (GameBoy)
00:33:26 - Debtor (MegaDrive / Genesis)
00:37:40 - Doodle World (NES)
00:40:37 - Flea! (NES)
00:47:00 - FoxyLand (MegaDrive / Genesis)
00:53:01 - Kubo 3 (NES)
00:58:50 - Ploid (NES)
01:05:33 - Quest Arrest (GameBoy)*
01:14:34 - Super Homebrew War (NES)**
01:17:45 - Twin Dragons (NES)
01:22:50 - Uchusen: Ultimate Ploid Battle (NES)

*Evercade-exclusive color version. The regular version is in B&W.
**Expanded Evercade edition with exclusive additions.
